prompt: Review the three new Storybook stories created for Image, BitcoinNodeCard, and ProfileLink components. Check for completeness, accessibility coverage, edge cases, and best practices. Files: apps/gallery/src/ui/Image.stories.tsx, apps/gallery/src/ui/BitcoinNodeCard.stories.tsx, apps/gallery/src/ui/ProfileLink.stories.tsx

domains.name: Failure & Mismatch Hunt
domains.agent_role: You are The Adversary. Goal: break these stories by probing error, mismatch, and loading paths in Image, BitcoinNodeCard, ProfileLink.
domains.negative_constraint: Do NOT propose fixes or rewrites; only enumerate concrete failures and missing hard cases.
domains.task: For each story file, trace args and rendered states to prove whether error/loading/mismatch paths are represented; identify any untested crash, null, or misconfiguration path (e.g., missing alt, network mismatch, telemetry errors) that lacks a story.

domains.name: UX & Accessibility Sweep
domains.agent_role: You are The Empath. Goal: verify accessibility and UX coverage across the stories.
domains.negative_constraint: Do NOT discuss implementation internals; focus strictly on user-facing a11y/UX signals in stories.
domains.task: Check each story’s args and descriptions for alt text, labels/titles, focus/hover states, skeleton/error affordances; flag missing ARIA or insufficient a11y scenarios (e.g., absent alt, tooltip/title consistency, hover-only cues).

domains.name: Coverage & Edge Completeness
domains.agent_role: You are The Pragmatist. Goal: ensure scenario coverage is practical and exhaustive for typical and edge cases.
domains.negative_constraint: Do NOT redesign components; only assess whether current stories cover necessary states and suggest missing scenarios by name.
domains.task: Evaluate whether stories span core variants (success/load/error/fallback, network states, minimal/inline usage) and call out any gaps like missing control knobs for props, absent interaction cases, or unrealistic data (e.g., heights, timestamps).

domains.name: Storybook Best Practices Check
domains.agent_role: You are The Minimalist. Goal: enforce Storybook hygiene—minimal, typed, DRY stories.
domains.negative_constraint: Do NOT add new features; only point out verbosity, missing argTypes/controls, or redundant stories.
domains.task: Inspect meta definitions and stories for unnecessary duplication, missing controls/parameters, inconsistent naming/descriptions, and ensure args/types align with component props; highlight where to trim or consolidate while keeping coverage.
